channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update March 2025
item.description: The second Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2025 will be hosted on Wednesday, March 5th, 2025 at 4pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.1 is available
item.description: The first patch for PrestaShop 8.2 is available. This release contains many bug fixes and improvements, including a new way to handle module filtering in the front office.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0 beta is now available!
item.description: The first beta version of PrestaShop 9.0 is now available for testing. This version includes many new features and improvements, a new Hummingbird theme, a new Admin API, PHP 8.4 and Symfony 6.4 support, many bug fixes, and a significant codebase cleanup. Read on to learn more about the new features and improvements.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - January
item.description: We are back with the first Core Monthly of 2025! ðŸŽ‰ Discover the latest updates in the PrestaShop project, including new releases, project highlights, community contributions, and more.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - January 2025
item.description: On January 29th, 2025, we hosted another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project with the latest news, announcements, and had the pleasure to host Software Components Squad members from PrestaShop SA.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update January 2025
item.description: The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2025 will be hosted on Wednesday, January 29th, 2025 at 4pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: SQL Injection attacks alert and security enhancements for PrestaShop
item.description: A recent wave of attacks has targeted PrestaShop stores, leveraging SQL Injection vulnerabilities in third-party modules to compromise data security. Malicious actors exploit these vulnerabilities to inject harmful code into the PrestaShop database, enabling the theft of sensitive customer information by loading unauthorized JavaScript scripts.

item.title: PSDevCon 2024 - testing and analyzing your PrestaShop modules automatically
item.description: During the PrestaShop Developer Conference 2024, Jonathan Danse presented methods for automatically testing and analyzing modules, ensuring their quality and reliability. In this guest article, Jonathan shares the key points from his conference and offers practical advice. Learn how to ensure high-performing modules with every deployment.

item.title: PSDevCon 2024 - PUIK (PrestaShop UI Kit) - The new UI kit from PrestaShop
item.description: During the second PrestaShop Developer Conference on November 6, 2024, I was able to introduce PUIK (PrestaShop UI Kit) to participants. This blog post provides a written summary of the presentation. During the talk, the audience gained a clearer understanding of PrestaShopâ€™s UI Kit, based on the new PrestaShop Design System. Learn how this library aims to provide a complete set of reusable components for the entire PrestaShop ecosystem. The GitHub repository is available here.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - November 2024
item.description: On November 27th, 2024, we held another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project with a special focus on the Upgrade Assistant.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update November 2024
item.description: The next Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, November 27th, 2024 at 4pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Event Synopsis - PrestaShop Developer Conference 2024
item.description: On November 6, 2024, the PrestaShop developer community gathered in Paris for a day of learning and networking at the second PrestaShop Developer Conference. The agenda was filled with insightful sessions and demonstrations. The event provided a platform to grow and learn more about PrestaShopâ€™s ecosystem, get project information as well as explore advancements usable in daily professional activities.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - October 2024
item.description: On October 30th, 2024, we hosted another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project with the latest news, announcements, and some insights into the projectâ€™s future.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update October 2024
item.description: Itâ€™s been a while but the next Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will be back on Wednesday, October 30th, 2024 at 4pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Project Newsletter Launch: Stay Informed!
item.description: At PrestaShop, we are always looking for ways to strengthen our relationship with the community. In line with this, we are thrilled to announce the launch of the PrestaShop Project Newsletter, a new initiative designed to bring you technical insights, exclusive updates, and educational content like never before.
